news_header: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni is under investigation for the release of a suspected Libyan warlord.
news_text: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni announced that she is under investigation regarding the release of Ossama Anjiem, a suspected Libyan warlord, who was detained under an ICC warrant for crimes against humanity. Anjiem was released on a technicality and flown back to Libya, prompting the ICC to demand an explanation from Italy. Meloni stated she is being investigated for aiding a crime and misusing public funds, asserting her determination not to be intimidated.
